doc.title: Blue Review
doc.plot: From the hottest blue movies to the steamiest websites and magazines, Blue Review is the show that points you to the best in adult entertainment. Presenters Emily Bouffante and Ian Royce combine their industry knowledge with sizzling sexual chemistry to whet your appetite on all things erotic. Sit down and be guided through videos from the high-budget entertainment of America's Jenna Jameson to the more down-to-earth charms of Britain's Ben Dover.
